body_html:
Right, so continue to place log statements until you don't see one getting hit. Then when that happens start bisecting the area between the last printout and the first missing printout until you've narrowed down the exact line.

There should also be more information associated with the segfault, could you please provide it?

body:
Right, so continue to place log statements until you don't see one getting hit. Then when that happens start bisecting the area between the last printout and the first missing printout until you've narrowed down the exact line.

There should also be more information associated with the segfault, could you please provide it?
